description: AMENDMENT 001: This amendment 001 is required to amend the Request for proposal(RFP) All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EDT on March 29, 2023 All bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. PWGSC, on behalf of Park Canada, is issuing this Request For Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition Supply bulk liquefied petroleum gas (PROPANE) to La Mauricie National Park, as and when required located in Shawinigan, Quebec, Canada, as detailed in Annex Statement of Requirement.

full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Propane for La Mauricie National Park

### Notice Information

* **Reference Number:** WS3906867228-Doc3907100876
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3906867228
* **Publication Date:** 2023-03-08
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-03-29T14:00:00

### Tender Details

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals for the acquisition of bulk liquefied petroleum gas (propane) for La Mauricie National Park. The park is located in Shawinigan, Quebec, Canada, and propane supply is required "as and when needed." 

The tender requires contractors to submit all required supporting documentation and bid submissions by 2 PM EDT on March 29, 2023. Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

### Procurement Method

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

### Contact Information

For any inquiries related to this tender, please contact:

* Sonia Langis (SPAC/PSPC)
* [sonia.langis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sonia.langis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

You can also visit the following website for more information on this tender:
